title: RP Store Error
body:
I bought Rugged Garen which it was 50% off and it took my RP as full price.  
Do you know if this is just a "visual bug"? If not, can I get my RP back wihout a refund?  {{item:3070}} 

I took pictures as proof.  

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=943560029050137&set=pb.100001884476327.-2207520000.1444026802.&type=3&theater 

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=943560029050137&set=pb.100001884476327.-2207520000.1444026802.&type=3&theater

replies.body:
Hey Synyster Vlad,

Did you try logging out/back in? That that correct your RP amount? If not, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can make any necessary corrections to your account.
